alt: Third party liability insurance prices have skyrocketed. In 1.5 years they have increased by as much as 40 percent. /123RF/PICSEL
article_heading: Third-party liability insurance increases reach 40 percent. Drivers can't believe what they see
description: The image depicts a scene of a car accident. Two cars are involved in the collision, one of which is a silver sedan and the other is a black SUV. The silver car is on the left side of the image, and the black car is on the right. Both cars have visible damage, with the silver car's hood crumpled and the black car's rear bumper and tailgate damaged.  In the background, there are two individuals who appear to be observing the scene. They are standing on the sidewalk, and one of them is wearing a blue shirt and black pants, while the other is wearing a white shirt and black pants. There are also two bicycles in the background, one on the left and one on the right side of the image.  The setting appears to be an urban environment with a street and a sidewalk. There are plants and a fence visible in the background, suggesting that this might be a residential area. The sky is clear, indicating fair weather conditions at the time of the accident.

article_heading: Renault 4 is just around the corner. Selected ones can already reserve it
description: The image depicts a modern architectural structure with a sleek, contemporary design. The building's facade is composed of a series of vertical lines that create a geometric pattern, giving the impression of a digital or futuristic aesthetic. The lines are illuminated with a soft, blue light that adds to the high-tech ambiance.  At the center of the image, there is a large, white, geometric shape that resembles a stylized letter 'H'. This shape is also illuminated with a bright, white light, which stands out against the blue background. The 'H' shape is positioned slightly off-center, adding a dynamic element to the composition.  The background is a gradient of blue hues, transitioning from a lighter shade at the top to a darker shade at the bottom, which gives the impression of a sky or a vast, open space. The overall effect is one of modernity, innovation, and a sense of otherworldly technology.

alt: Porsche 718 Cayman driver tried to outsmart police officers but only attracted their attention /Police

The officers are dressed in standard police uniforms, with one wearing a white cap and the other a black cap. They appear to be engaged in a conversation or conducting an inspection of the vehicle.  In the background, there are multiple streetlights illuminating the area, and a building with a blue facade can be seen, which might be a commercial or public building. The image captures a moment of interaction between law enforcement and a vehicle, which could imply a traffic stop, a routine check, or a response to a specific incident.

article_heading: At what age can you get a motorcycle license? Categories and requirements

The motorcycle is parked and appears to be stationary. The motorcycle's design is sleek and modern, with a prominent front fairing and a single seat. The overall setting appears to be an urban environment, possibly a parking lot or a street.

The background features a building with a stone facade, and the setting appears to be an urban environment. The man's attire and the car suggest a formal or professional context.

alt: Silesian police bought 85 new Toyota Corolla TS /Police
article_heading: New police weapon for PLN 13 million. It looks exactly like the old police weapon
description: The image shows a close-up view of the front of a police car. The car is predominantly blue with a black grille and headlights. The Toyota logo is visible on the grille, indicating the make of the vehicle. The license plate is clearly visible and reads "HP-P A071," which is a standard format for vehicle registration plates in many countries. The car is equipped with blue emergency lights, which are illuminated, suggesting that the vehicle is currently in operation. The background is blurred, but it appears to be an urban environment with buildings and possibly other vehicles. The text "POLICJA" is visible on the car, which is the Polish word for "police," indicating that the vehicle is likely used by the Polish police force.

alt: New fuel promotions have started at Auchan Hyperoil stations /Michał Domański /INTERIA.PL
article_heading: Fuel prices haven't been this low in years. Have you received a text message with the promotion yet?
description: The image shows a close-up view of a vehicle's fuel tank cap. The cap is green with a blue label on it, and there is a QR code visible on the label. The cap is being used to fill the vehicle with fuel. The fuel pump is visible behind the cap, and the fuel nozzle is inserted into the fuel tank. The vehicle's body is black, and the fuel pump is also black. The cap has a rubber seal around the edge to ensure a tight fit when attached to the fuel tank. The QR code on the cap suggests that it may be a smart cap, which can be scanned to provide information about the fuel level or other details. The image is taken from a perspective that focuses on the cap and the fuel pump, with the rest of the vehicle's body in the background.

article_heading: 700 new radars for the police. You can no longer get away with a ticket

The officer is wearing a uniform consisting of a dark blue jacket with reflective stripes, a white cap with a blue band, and a high-visibility vest. The officer is holding a pair of binoculars, which are commonly used for monitoring traffic and ensuring safety. The officer appears to be focused on observing the traffic, possibly looking for any violations or ensuring that vehicles are moving in an orderly manner. The setting suggests an urban environment with a road that is visible in the background, and there are vehicles that indicate this is a busy area. The officer's stance and the equipment used imply a professional and vigilant approach to their duties.

alt: A special police operation resulted in issuing 308 tickets /Police
article_heading: They issued tickets for over 134 thousand PLN. Spectacular police action
description: The image depicts a nighttime scene on a wet road, likely due to recent rain. There are two police officers standing on the side of the road, engaged in a conversation with a driver of a blue car. The car is stopped, and the driver appears to be in the process of being issued a ticket or receiving a warning from the officers.  The police officers are wearing high-visibility vests with the word "POLICJA" printed on them, indicating that they are from Poland. They are equipped with standard police uniforms and hats, and one of them is holding a ticket or document, which is commonly used for traffic enforcement.  The car's license plate is visible, but it's not clear enough to read the registration details. The car's tail lights are illuminated, suggesting that the car is either moving or has been stopped recently.  The environment is illuminated by artificial lighting from street lamps and possibly from the car's headlights, which creates a contrast with the dark sky and wet road. The overall atmosphere suggests a routine traffic stop or a minor traffic violation being addressed by the officers.
